The threat included a suspicious link (grat.in/uxdyd), which may have been intended for tracking or malware.
Attorney Stacey Richman forwarded the threat via email on May 25, 2020, indicating potential legal involvement or reporting.
The document shows communication about a threat occurring years after Jeffrey Epstein's death, suggesting ongoing concerns or harassment related to the case.
